alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 8:11PM CST until February 03 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River at Bigbee For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Bigbee, Amory, Aberdeen L & D...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Bigbee. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying agricltural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 14.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
